text:
Timothy James O'Connor (July 3, 1927 – April 5, 2018) was an American character actor. He was known for his roles are Dr. Elias Huer in "Buck Rogers in the 25th Century", Jack Boland in "General Hospital", and Elliot Carson in "Peyton Place". He also had recurring roles on "Barnaby Jones" and "Dynasty".
O'Connor died of heart failure in Nevada City, California on April 5, 2018 at the age of 90.
